import { Grid, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box, Container } from '@mui/system' import React from 'react' import { getOurStory } from '../../util/AdminUtil' const OurStoryBig = () => { const sections = getOurStory(); return ( {sections.map(section => { return {section.leftImage && <> {section.smallHeader} {section.bigHeader} {section.sectionText} } {!section.leftImage && <> {section.smallHeader} {section.bigHeader} {section.sectionText} } })} {/* where we've been our history Founded by Eric Resch in 1993, Stone Creek Coffee was built on the idea that we have an obligation to care for those around us. We have endeavored to conduct our business with this authentic care as we've grown from a single, small cafe in Whitefish Bay to where we are today. We call downtown Milwaukee “home,” and we work to see the flourishing of this great city. where we've been our history Founded by Eric Resch in 1993, Stone Creek Coffee was built on the idea that we have an obligation to care for those around us. We have endeavored to conduct our business with this authentic care as we've grown from a single, small cafe in Whitefish Bay to where we are today. We call downtown Milwaukee “home,” and we work to see the flourishing of this great city. */}


) } export default OurStoryBig
